error.activeThread: Music thread is already active in this server!

client.noPermissions: I am missing the required permissions to join your channel!

user.notConnected: You are not in a  voice channel!
user.differentChannel: We are not in the same channel!

queue.title: Music queue
queue.footer: Send the Name / Url of a Youtube Song / Playlist in the Thread!

thread.name: Music thread!
thread.archivedName: Used to be a music thread...

play.description: Play a youtube song or playlist by typing it's name or url in the Music thread. NOTE: There can only be around 300 songs in the queue at once!
play.maxSongs: There can only be around 300 songs in the queue!

loop.label: Loop Song
loop.description: `Loop song`: Loops the currently played song.

loopQueue.label: Loop Queue
loopQueue.description: `Loop Queue`: Loops all the songs in the queue.

pageForward.description: `>`: Show the next page of songs in the queue.

pageBackward.description: `<`: Show the previous page of songs in the queue.

stop.description: `◼`: Stop the music completely. Requires double clicking for confirmation
stop.confirm: Click on `◼` again if you are sure you want to stop the music.
stop.reply: These are the songs you have removed from the queue, you can paste the whole file or just it's content back in to the queue.

replay.description: `↺`: Replays the currently playing song from the beginning.

edit.description: `▼`: Shows additional buttons for managing the queue.

remove.label: Remove
remove.description: `Remove`: Removes song selected in a dropdown from the queue.

dropdown.placeholder: Select the song you want to remove.

forward.label: Forward
forward.description: `Forward`: Sends a selected song to the start of the queue.

dropdown.placeholder: Select the song you want to push to the front.

shuffle.label: Shuffle
shuffle.description: `Shuffle`: Shuffles all the songs in the queue.

expand.label: Expand
expand.description: `Expand`: Shows full names of the songs in the queue.

clear.label: Clear
clear.description: `Clear`: Removes all the songs from the queue.
clear.confirm: Click on `Clear` again if you are sure, you want to remove all the songs from the queue.
clear.reply: These are the songs you have removed from the queue, you can paste the whole file or just it's content back in to the queue.

clientRestarted: Bot has been restarted due to a new update.
innactivityDisconnect:
Bot has disconnected due to innactivity,
or being disconnected by another member.
help: Sorry, there is no help available.
